unnormalised: Borem, konnem tori vicharleam ki Bharoti khobram kanalam zotixacher itle bhor dile kiteak? Bhava, hanv tem sodtat asa mhonnge, kednacho! Hem 2024 asa, 1724 nhoi, barem? Tujea motant ami ulo korunk zai, mhonnge, kiteim tori, khore khobro?
normalised: Ata, konnen tor poochle ki Bharoti khobram vhalem jyotishacher itle diwane kiteak? Bhava, hanv tem sodtale punn chodd kall zal'lo! Don hozar ani vis ani char, satra hozar ani vis ani char nhoi, sarke? Tuka distele amchean ulo korcho poddtele, mhuntleari, hanv kitem tori, khari khobro?

unnormalised: Khorench, hem bud'dh bhramachem asa. Mhonnge, tum TV 7:00 PM IST-ak chalu kortai, novea ghotalleam vixim aikunk vo tor fokot, fokot borem khobor aikunk. Nhoi! Tech suvater, “Aaj ka rashifal” eka guru sangata tumcho dis boro zatolo zaite mhunn sodunk, mhonnge, gire koso asat? Hanv xappat gheun sangtam, zalea Shani devacho boro dis na zalear, purnn desh dukbhogta zata.
normalised: Satyan, tem bud'dh vibhramakari. Mhaka dista, tuvem ti vi at sat vaje I S Tacher ugodda korun, aekdum navim ghotalyanchi khobar aikuchea vellar nam tor, kaim tori bore khobro. Vo! Taji jyotishachem uddegatachem divos koso zatolo ti sodhi. Hanv shappat gheta, jar Shani devache ek vait divos asa, tevhah desh dukhi astoli.

unnormalised: Ani techim natkeam! "Makar rashi wale log, sambhal ke!" (Makarche lok, sambalun ravat!). Tumchem jivit eka naktrak depend asa mhunn bhaxen. Hanvem aiklelem poilechea disamni, mhojem jivit mhaka auto-rickshaw cholovpi Rs. 50 extra gheun cholovpi karann traffic asli mhunn.
normalised: Ani te kiteak natak kortat! "Makar rashi valem lok, sambhal ke!" (Makar rashechem lok, hushar rav!). Tor tujem jeevon ek tarecher adharit asa. Aekdum utim sodlo, tumchem jeevon mhujhea auto-rickshaw chalakan pangra rupai zasti ailem kiteak tumchi "traffic".

unnormalised: Tem khupuch hounsachemh asa kiteak te zotixa tem khorem vishayan dharun hadtat. Mhonnge, stock market 15/03/2023-ak podlem ani khobramchem anchor uloita, "Hem purannan vedant poilich sangla!" Bhava, Goldman Sachs reportacher sangla zaite mhunn kedna vichar kelai?
normalised: Tem bore zata jevhah tanim jyotisham ashalakshat ghevun ghatna samjik zateli. Aekdum, share bazar pongra march don hozar ani vis ani tin vait zale ani khobramkar mhunttalo, "Tem puratan vedik pustakacher asle." Mhaka dista, tori tem Goldman Sachs reportacher astalem, kiteak tori tem sodhi?

unnormalised: Ani "remedies" asa. Aai go, remedies. "Gireak somadhan karunk, pivllim sapphire ghal ani Shanvarak 2 kgs kali dalleam dan kor." Khorench? Mhaka zaite boro return mellto zaite mhunn te duddu SBI-chea fixed depositak ghalear.
normalised: Maga ek upai asa. Oh dev, upai. "Tarecher thando dovoro, pivlle safir bhator ani don kilogram kala tor dal' sobotacher bhet'ta korun". Satyan? Hanv bore girestim porot bhator ghetele S B Icher.

unnormalised: Hanv chintam te kiteak kortat mhonnge tem sust ani sokoll content. Eka zotixak dharun ghe, kainch graphics screenacher mar ani boom, tumchea kodden 30 mintanche airtime bhorlelem asa. Ani khorem sangon, Bharatamni khup zann heam vostumcher bhavarth kortat. Tem somadhanachem asa, mhunnun chintunk kosmic plan cholta asa mhunn fokot tumkam khobre mhonnun, tumkam rozache jivitache gholl melltole.
normalised: Hanv sodhtam tem ulaytale kiteak tem sodhe ani sulle astale. Aek jyotishi dhorta, screenacher grafik had ani bum, tumchen tis minttam chalu asa. Plus, satyan ulo korunk, zaito lok Bharota tor sodhtalo. Tem aaram asa, mhaka dista, kitem tori plan asata tor dukhi jeevon nhoi.

unnormalised: Hea karnan, Bharoti khobro ani zotixa. Hem ek match asa zachem bhogen, mhonnge, sorga nhoi, punn definitely ek studio Noida 25/07/2024! Hanv mhonnge Netflix-acher ravtan ani algorithm zotixa so disouncheam nhoi dakhoi mhunn umed kortam. Konnak tori remedies asa mhunn khobre asa?
normalised: Tori, Bharoti khobro ani jyotisham. Tem banavle kiteak, tori te swargan banavlen nhoi, punn banavle Noida studio don hozar ani vis ani char july. Mhaka dista hanv Netflix sodhtalo tori algorithm jyotisham karakram nhoi dukhavat. Konak tori ek upai astalo?
